name: ARTificial (itch) (Made on earth games)
description:
Connect the shapes and simultaneously paint your own version of 'Amendment #8' by Mark Bradford, 'Untitled' by Jackson Pollock* and 'El Velorio de Oller en Nueva York' by Jorge Soto Sánchez*!

The more shapes you bring together the higher your score!

Can you earn 5 stars on all artworks?

*Will be included in later versions

How to play

A tutorial will be added later, so in the meantime:

Click and drag on a shape/color to draw a line to either :

1. A same shape; 

or;

2. A shape with the same fill (i.e. a filled inside, a hollow inside or a striped inside)

Get a multiplier added by connecting to a a shape that isnt the same as the previous and for every 5 shapes you connect in a single row/chain!

The amount of stars you get depend on your points and the size of the biggest community/chain you've created.

SAAM Game Jam

This game was made for the SAAM Arcade 2021 GameJam.

The theme was/is building community, embracing individualty;

In this game you try to connect as many shapes to bring them together (as a community). Every shape you connect has to have at least one thing in common, but by connecting them you're able to connect every shape to each other via others. It is, however, your choice in how to connect them.

By doing so you create your very own art piece. One like the once made by the great individuals, like Bradford, Pollock and Soto Sánchez, whom's work are displayed at museums like the Smithsonian American Art Museum and the like.

The game was inspired by 'Amendment #8' by Mark Bradford and i drew a lot of inspiration of the game 'Mini motorways'. The music used is made by VGcomposer.
